medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RLQ pain began 10 hours ago; abdominal cramping developed 24 hours ago and became sharp RLQ pain overnight. The pain is sharp, non-radiating, and he has not taken anything by mouth in 20 hours. He denies fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recent bronchitis, COPD, BPH, glaucoma, depression, history of renal stones
